body_html:
Actually, talking to @asimshankar offline, he came up with a different approach that seems more in line with the current API. Instead of exposing TF_CONTROL_SLOT, how about we add a new function instead:

TF_GraphImportGraphDefOptionsRemapControlDependency(
  TF_ImportGraphDefOptions* opts,
  const char* src_name,
  TF_Operation* dst);

This is similar to other parts of the API where we explicitly create functions for control dependencies (e.g. TF_AddControlInput, TF_ImportGraphDefOptionsAddControlDependency).
body:
Actually, talking to @asimshankar offline, he came up with a different approach that seems more in line with the current API. Instead of exposing TF_CONTROL_SLOT, how about we add a new function instead:
```
TF_GraphImportGraphDefOptionsRemapControlDependency(
  TF_ImportGraphDefOptions* opts,
  const char* src_name,
  TF_Operation* dst);
```
This is similar to other parts of the API where we explicitly create functions for control dependencies (e.g. TF_AddControlInput, TF_ImportGraphDefOptionsAddControlDependency).
